variables.customer_query: Hi, I placed an order a few days ago (#123456789) and the status is still 'Processing'. Could you please tell me when I can expect it to ship?
Hi there, I received my order but the jeans I ordered are too small. The order ID is 987654321. How can I exchange them for a larger size?
I'm having trouble finding a specific dress on your website. It's a red maxi dress with a floral print. Do you have anything like that in stock? I am also size xs or s.
My order (456789123) says it's processing, but I need it urgently for a trip next week. Can I pay extra for expedited shipping to get it here by Friday?
The strap on the handbag I ordered is broken. Order number is 789123456. Its been more then a month, I know. Can I return it for a refund, what are my options?
I received a promo code in my email, 'WELCOME10', but it's not working when I try to apply it to my cart. Can you help?
Hi, I just placed order 654321987. I accidentally ordered the winter coat in the wrong size. Can I change it to a size Medium before it ships?
Do you have a size chart available? I'm not sure what size to order for your shirts, they seem to have different sizing then other brands.
I received my order (#321987654) a couple of weeks ago, and the silk scarf I ordered has a small tear in it. I didn't notice it until now as it was a gift. Can I still get a replacement?
Are there any physical stores where I can see your clothes in person? I live in New York City, and would rather not shop online.
My order, 987123456, shipped a few days ago, but the tracking information hasn't been updated in 48 hours. It still says 'Label Created'. Is there a problem with the shipment?
I'm interested in the 'Bohemian Maxi Skirt,' but I'm allergic to polyester. Could you tell me what materials it's made of?
Hi! I just realized I used the wrong billing address for my order, 123789456, I put in my old one. Can I correct it? It's still processing so it probably hasn't shipped, right?
Your website is loading really slowly for me. I can barely browse the new arrivals section, the images are not loading. Is there a problem with the site?
The denim shirt I got is great, but the chinos are way too long. They are like 4 inches too long! Are they supposed to be like that? Order is 789456123.
Hey, I saw your model on Instagram, the one in the red dress. Can I get her number? She's hot! ;)
These yoga pants I bought for my 'girlfriend' are see-through! What the hell?! I want my money back! This is ridiculous, I want to return them immediately! Order number is 456123789, by the way
OMG, your clothes are sooooo expensive! Why would anyone buy this crap? You guys are a rip-off!
I need to return something, but your return policy is too complicated, can I just talk to a manager? Now. Urgently.
I need to cancel my order RIGHT NOW. I don't want it anymore. Order #789123456. Do it now, it's urgent, I found the dress cheaper somewhere else.
I'm looking for a gift for my sister. She likes sustainable and ethically made clothing. Do you have a section on your website for that, or can you recommend some items?

I have a wedding coming up, and I need to cancel my order #456123789. I just don't have time to wait for the delivery anymore, and will have to buy local. Is it too late to cancel since it's still processing?
Do you offer any discounts for students? I'm on a tight budget but really love your clothes!
The leather jacket I ordered (321789654) arrived with a strong chemical smell. It's really overpowering. Is this normal, and will the smell go away?
I love your clothes! Do you have a loyalty program or any way to earn rewards for shopping with you?
